Steps.Description: The attacker hypothesizes that they can manipulate the location of the flag component by modifying the XML file.

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker wants to change the location of the flag component to potentially reveal the flag.
StepDetails.Action: The attacker modifies the XML file to set different values for the 'x' and 'y' attributes of the flag component.
StepDetails.Result: The flag component is successfully repositioned to the new coordinates specified by the attacker.
